question_content:
What year was python created in?

A. 1990
 B. 2004
C. 2008
D. 1993
What country was python created in?

Which of the following is python NOT used for?

A. Data Analysis
B. System Scripting
C. Nuclear Warfare
D. Web Development

Which of the following operating systems does NOT come with Python already installed?

A. Mac
B. Windows
C. Linux
D. None of the above

Which app do you need to install from the App Store for Python installation on a Mac?

A. Flappy Bird
B. ZCode
C. Final Cut Pro X
D. XCode
Enter code to perform the calcualation '2 plus 2'. Remember to add spaces between operators and numbers.
Enter code to exit a python code while it is running.

What file extension do python files use?

A. .py
B. .exe
C. .app
D. .python

What is the output from the follwing python code:

print('Hello World!')

A. 'Hello World!'
B. Hello World!
C. hello world
D. helloworld

What symbol is used to signify the end of a line of code in Python?

A. a semicolon (;)
B. a colon (:)
C. a full stop(.)
D. nothing

What will the output be for the following piece of code?

def my_function():
print('First command')

A. 'First command'
B. First command
C. An error will output
D. print("first command")
Enter the starting character of a line that will signify a comment in Python.

Which of the following operators will assign a value to a variable?

A. ==
B. ->
C. <-
D. =
